name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alchemy: AI Copilot for Professionals (GPT-4 & Claude 3.5)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your work with expert prompts, premium AI models, and more. Your complete AI toolkit, updated weekly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alchemy - the ultimate AI sidekick that's about to revolutionize your digital workflow. This powerful browser extension harnesses the latest advancements in AI technology, including ChatGPT and Claude, to boost your productivity and make your online adventures more engaging than ever before.

Whether you're a busy professional, a studious learner, or a creative mind, Alchemy has got your back with a versatile suite of features designed to streamline your tasks and infuse a touch of fun into your digital life.

Key Features:

💬 Unlimited Chat: Chat freely with cutting-edge AI models like ChatGPT for insightful brainstorming, witty banter, and real-time explanations.

📋 Unlimited Snippets: Save time by creating unlimited text snippets with simple keywords - let Alchemy handle repetitive typing.

🔍 AI Summaries: Get concise summaries of web pages and videos without leaving your tab.

👥 Interactive Browsing: Engage directly with online content for an immersive and insightful experience.

🖼️ Image Generation: Unleash your creativity with Dall-E AI and generate unlimited stunning visuals.

🔎 AI Search: Find answers fast with web-powered searches complete with citations.

📸 Image OCR & Screenshots: Snap unlimited screenshots, extract text from images, and chat with visuals.

📖 Chat with PDFs: Upload and chat with unlimited PDFs to make sense of dense documents.

💡 Full Prompt Library: Access a vast library of creative prompts to kickstart your projects.

✍️ Unlimited Custom Prompts: Create and share unlimited custom prompts tailored to your needs.

⭐ Unlimited Favorite Prompts: Save unlimited go-to prompts for quick access.

📂 Unlimited Documents: Save and manage unlimited AI responses all in one place.

⚡ Quick Prompts: Get instant summaries, explanations and more with a single click.

🔊 Speech to Text: Use voice to interact with AI for added convenience.

📌 Floating Toolbar: Select any text for a floating AI toolbar to chat, add prompts and get custom results.

But what really sets Alchemy apart is its ability to make your digital experience fun. With its playful yet professional interface, Alchemy turns tasks into engaging activities, ensuring maximum efficiency and entertainment.

Download Alchemy today and upgrade your digital life with the power of AI!
